$MELI - MercadoLibre
PE: 05.6x â”‚Foward PE: 41.8x
5y Revenue Growth: 29.7% â”‚Profit margin: 7.9%
ROIC: 14.8% â”‚ Debt/Equity: 1.5x
1-year performance: 12%

MercadoLibre is arguably the most dominant e-commerce and fintech ecosystem in Latin America, a moat that competitors struggle to replicate.

Unique active buyers reached 76.8 million (+26% YoY), the highest level since Q1 2021. The company continues expanding rapidly in Colombia, Chile, Ecuador, and Peru, markets still in the early stages of e-commerce adoption.

Total Payment Volume grew 52% YoY, supported by record monthly active users and high Net Promoter Scores in Brazil. MercadoLibreâ€™s credit portfolio also doubled year over year while maintaining record-low default rates.

Chile and Colombia delivered double-digit GMV growth, with Chile posting its third consecutive quarter of acceleration.

As automation, credit scaling, and fintech monetization compound through 2026, MercadoLibre is transitioning from a hyper-growth disruptor into a long-term compounder, the Amazon + PayPal of Latin America.

Since 2016, MercadoLibre has grown revenue every single quarter, a rare achievement that highlights the durability and resilience of its business model.
